name: HuggingFace Inference 最小
description: Inference API の最小呼び出し

files.template:
const res = await fetch('https://api-inference.huggingface.co/models/{{model}}', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.HF_API_KEY}` }, body: JSON.stringify({ inputs: 'Hello' }) });
console.log(await res.json());
